Author: sudhakark
Title: OTPPAY PRIVATE SALE LIVE!!!
Body: OTPPAY Omni Token Platform for Payments is a blockchain driven wallet used to exchange and pay. OTPPAY is the world's largest platform where you can trade and make payments to the merchants through crypto, charges very low fee very quickly or escrow based. The customer is going to convert cryptocurrency to fiat currency, artificial intelligence and transaction matching engines will convert cryptocurrency to OTPPAY tokens, OTPPAY tokens are converted into fiat currency and all this process take place within no time. OTPPAY is a payment platform where users can use their cryptocurrency to pay to the merchants. OTPPAY gives safety and they find an easy way to receive funds in the form of fiat currency. if you want to do any payment OTPPAY provides a facility to change the primary payment option from any cryptocurrency to OTTPAY tokens or fiat currency and can be done very instantly. OTPPAY security system is designed to join the traditional fiat currency security standards and with the latest blockchain technology. OTPPAY tokens of the users will just tap to scan the QR with their smart phones or you can also use the OTTPAY debit card for the payment purpose.  If users want to do a small 0.5% OTP transaction fee will be charged.

Author: otppay
Title: OTPPAY PRIVATE SALE LIVE!!!
Body: Visit https://www.otppay.io  OTPPAY is an ‚ÄúOmni Token Platform for Payments‚Äù, the Blockchain powered Wallet (Buy | Sell | Exchange & Pay). OTPPAY will be the world‚Äôs largest platform in which all major crypto assets can be bought, traded and even make payments to the merchants at low fees instantly or escrow based. The pain point of crypto to fiat conversion by the merchant is bridged. Yes, through our innovative Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning based order/transaction matching engines will convert any cryptocurrency to OTPPAY tokens and OTPPAY tokens to fiat currency just in time.  OTPPAY is an unique payment platform, which will pave a way to use their favorite cryptocurrency in order to pay the vendors/merchants instantly. We provide vendors with the safety and convenience of receiving funds in fiat currency.  One can even change the primary payment option from any cryptocurrency to OTPPAY tokens or fiat currency instantly, thus by protecting them from cryptocurrency market volatility. Our OTPPAY security system will be designed with the blend of traditional fiat currency security standards and latest blockchain technology.  We will be acting as the catalyst to enable the just in time cross-border e-commerce and business transactions which will reduce the dependency of Forex mediums. Our solution will disrupt the Forex/cross-border financial market instantly. Our API‚Äôs will interact with the global eKYC interfaces and hyper ledgers to avoid the anti-social transactions. Our omnipresence data mining infrastructure will help us to build the proprietary negative database of suspicious transactions and block them in future thus by saving crypto-miners time & money.  In near future, our AI-powered smart engines will be used to frame Crypto Credit Rating (CCR) system, by which merchants & users will be benefited from the OTPPAY Lend features.  Any new technology advancement will be considered to be successful if it creates a change in common people from all ethnic and age groups. To achieve the sustainable ecosystem, the innovative platform which we build should balance the Current market Vs Futuristic market. In this age of cryptocurrencies, there is a mile gap to be bridged in payments and settlements or conversion of cryptocurrency to the fiat currency. Our main aim is to create an artificial intelligence based engine, which will match the buy/sell/exchange/pay requests in a fraction of second and counterbalance the settlements in fiat currencies.  By building a smart engine, we can able to make the cryptocurrencies available for the common people and ensuring them equivalent fiat currencies can be exchanged at any time, thus by creating a stable fiat‚Ää‚Äî‚Ääcrypto shift.  As an organization, we look to keep things transparent, with our financials, business models, licenses, accreditation's, revenue streams and audit reports. Our ‚ÄúOmni Token Platform‚Äù will pave way for crypto transformation with transparent business modelling with fair justifiable charges.   Token Details  ICO Structure ICO Token Supply- 600m OTP Reserved- 200m Bonus & Referral- 111m Private Investors- 70m Employee & Public Contributors- 19m  ICO Facts Token Classification: Utility Token Soft Cap: 1250 ETH Hard Cap: 71250 ETH Token Protocol: ETH / ERC20 Token Enrichment: 0.10% of total Revenue will be used to buy back tokens and it will be destroyed on monthly basis. Unsold Tokens will be burned.  Visit https://www.otppay.io Telegram: https://t.me/otppaychat Linkedin: https://www.linkedin.com/company/otppay Twitter: https://twitter.com/otppay YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCxsEB7olWuJzEzf5Vy_GJCA Medium: https://medium.com/@atotppay

Author: Miiike
Title: OTPPAY PRIVATE SALE LIVE!!!
Body: Interesting. If I remember correctly, there was a concept similar to yours one or two years ago. I can't remember if they were building an app or "in set" with their own coin, but the gist was they propose to build a system where someone can use crypto for a daily life micro transaction like buying coffee.  I remember that one of the main problem they encountered was the fact that both party needs to have the system. And although, from that project, I can see that it is quite easy to arrange a coffee owner and a coffee drinker (which mostly quite familiar with recent technologies) to adapt crypto payment, I find it hard to introduce this concept to... grocery sector, or bread and butter.  Do you have special strategy to penetrate this certain segment?

Title: OTPPAY PRIVATE SALE LIVE!!!
